tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I have had really bad experiences with a few doctors in the past *** ******* * ****** **** **** **** ******* ** ***** ***** * *** *** ******* ****** ** ** *** ** *** **** ******* *** *** **** *** **** ********* **** ***** He is caring, he gives time to his patients, he follows up from time to time, he listens to your problem and suggests the best course of action, he doesn't over charge for anything, he will tell you everything as it is and his consultation fees is so reasonable that everyone can afford to visit him.
His wife Dr. Mrs. Desai is equally amazing.
Their clinic is so spik and span. Each and every hygiene standards are followed thoroughly. I have never seen any doctor follow all the precautions and rules the way Dr. Desai does. You are safe in his hands is what i can vouch for.
I will definitely recommend Dr. Desai to everyone. ** ** *** *****

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: Dr. Jasmit Desai briefly explains the treatment, also reschedules the appointment without hesitation and does regular follow up with patients. He makes you very  comfortable during the treatment and also gives long term solutions to maintain good dental health.Special Thanks to him, for giving dental treatment during this pandemic situation, following all safety measures like Sanitisation,PPE Kit,Masks,Gloves,Head cap,etc.I am very satisfied with my overall experience of his treatment, would highly recommend him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Explains very well with full patience. Advices and how to protect the tooth. 
Clinic is very hygienic, 
Doctor has kept hand sanitizer before entering we need to sanitize our hands 
Then doctor gives us one pack which contains cap, gloves and mask which we need to wear it.
There is a machine kept in his clinic we need to keep our foot in that Machine and it gets covered with plastic .
Doctor gave me one form to fill about my details which I did

Doctor also wears ppt which makes him fully covered  and safe.

Very happy with his services.

I am regular and old client. 
Me and my mom and my sisters visit there as being permanent client.
The rates are reasonable  and affordable.

I suggest everyone to visit this clinic

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
context: Crowns and Bridges Fixing,Root Canal Treatment (RCT),
review:
Dr Jasmit is a dentist I would recommend to anyone. On the onset of my first meeting with him he was very patient n assuring. He put me at ease n explained in detail the procedure n cost. He answered all my numerous questions thereby winning my trust n confidence in him. My apprehensions &fears had all disappeared. I had two rootcanals n three bridges to do. I had many sittings n never once he kept me waiting. Since I was in a hurry he fixed two bridges n on my return he fixed the third one. He is so dedicated that he redid the first two becos the bite was not proper & I had a problem with the color. He even fixed the protruding tooth on the previous bridge that I was always conscious about. Today I am happy n satisfied that when I smile it's perfect.
Dr Jasmit maybe young but he is experienced enough to guarantee you the best. So keep up the good work Dr Jasmit.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Dr Jasmit is a dentist I would recommended to anyone. Right from the onset he was friendly, accomedating,patient kind n gentle n very assuring n good at his job. I wasn't nervous or scared.. He explained in detail the procedure n cost. He answered all my numerous questions patiently. (Believe me I had alot of them) he gave me full attention n time. Didn't keep me waiting. I had 3 bridges to do. Because I was in a hurry he did 2 of them n when I came back to do the third one he redid the other two as well so that all three would be in alignment. That's how dedicated he is about his work. He even even redefined the tooth that jutted out & made me conscious of smiling. Today I can happily smile at the camera becos I now have the perfect smile.
Thank you Dr Jasmit.

review: Hi Rakesh pawar here I am not happy with the treatment but yes docter is friendly . After 6month i had pain in my tooth wich have done rct and put artificial cap. ******* ** ******** ** **** *** **** ***** he charged me i dont know why. And finally again I have to visit other docter and pay him for the same. ****** **** ** ******* ********** ** *** ******
reply_text:
Hello sir firstly would like to apologise for the inconvenience caused to you from my part but as far as i remember i had been repeatedly contacting you for a follow-up and had informed you there wont be any charges for the new tooth cap of the treated tooth however you did not show up in your follow-up appointments..
Anyways sir inconvenience caused to you is highly regretted and we hooe to serve you better in future
